it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.Test

Class MyHTTPServer_ClientTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unifi.rc.httpserver.m5765968.Test.MyHTTPServer_ClientTest

  • public class MyHTTPServer_ClientTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class tests the server with various types required, printing the answers.
    Author:
    Mattia D'Autilia

      Creates the client and connect it to the server and start the InputStream Scanner and the OutpuStream PrintWriter.
